backend/main.mo: Motoko chat backend storing messages, rate-limiting sends, trimming content, and returning paginated messages.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based CSS defining warm OKLCH color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the Inter font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation between Chat and AI Video pages with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Header component showing app branding and Internet Identity authentication controls.
Message input form with validation, authentication gating, character counter, and send handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageFeed.tsx: Scrollable message list with auto-scroll logic, avatars, timestamps, and empty-state UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatMessages.ts: Fetches and polls the latest chat messages using the backend actor, adjusting polling based on tab visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnchor.ts: Tracks whether the user is near the bottom of a scroll container to control auto‑scrolling for new messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useSendMessage.ts: Sends chat messages through the backend actor and invalidates the message query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with warm color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/chatValidation.ts: Validates chat message content for emptiness and max length, returning trimmed results.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers a browser download by programmatically clicking a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/lib/localClipGenerator.ts: Generates a simple placeholder video clip using a canvas image and returns a downloadable blob URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoPage.tsx: UI for generating placeholder AI videos, validating inputs, producing clips, and allowing downloads.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays chat messages, handles authentication prompts, and renders the message feed and composer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended theme tokens, custom animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state metadata, feature list, architectural notes, and required assets for the chat and video-generation app.
